publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-SPaRe data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.settlement: wäräda Dägʿa Tämben, ṭabiya Sälam, qušät Tänsǝḥe

note.ab: Gädam. The old rock hewn church is reserved only for the monastic community; the recent church of Kidanä Mǝḥrät located before the entrance to the monastic compound, is used by the local community.

47 Mss. photographed: TKMG-001 “Miracles of Mary”; TKMG-002 “Book of the Rite of the Passion Week”; TKMG-003 “Miracles of Mary”; TKMG-004 “Four Gospels”; TKMG-005 “Four Gospels”; TKMG-006 “Synaxarion (Second half of the years)”; TKMG-007 “The Faith of the Fathers”; TKMG-008 “Psalter”; TKMG-009 “Justice of the Kings”; TKMG-010 “Collection of Mariam texts and other texts”; TKMG-011 “Horologium of Egypt”; TKMG-012 “Vita of Kiros”; TKMG-013 “Acts of the Apostles”; TKMG-014 “Psalter”; TKMG-015 “The Book of Minor Prophets with Commentary in Gǝ`ǝz and Amharic”; TKMG-016 “Testament of our Lord”; TKMG-017 “Psalter”; TKMG-018 “The Book of Cyrill”; TKMG-019 “Book of the interpretation of the Gospels”; TKMG-020 “Calendaric Treatise”; TKMG-022 “Lectionary for the year”; TKMG-023 “Homily of St. Michael”; TKMG-024 “Miracles of Jesus ”; TKMG-025 “The Harph of Praise”; TKMG-026 “The Book of the Spiritual Elder”; TKMG-027 “Praise of God”; TKMG-028 “The Disciples”; TKMG-029 “Mäwasǝʿt”; TKMG-030 “Part of Dǝggwa” ;TKMG-031 “Miracles of Jesus ”; TKMG-032 “The Book of the Jar; monastic ritual”; TKMG-033 “Psalter”; TKMG-034 “Spiritual Elder ( with commentary in Gǝʿǝz and Amharic)”; TKMG-035 “Vita of the Righteous Ones”; TKMG-036 “Psalter”; TKMG-037 “Homily of the Sabbath of Christians Five Piltass of Mystery”; TKMG-038 “The Disciples”; TKMG-039 “Psalter”; TKMG-040 “Gospel of John”; TKMG-041 “Gospel of John”; TKMG-042 “Homily of the Sariour of the world”; TKMG-043 “The Five Pilars of Faith (commentary)”; TKMG-045 “The collection of Images”; TKMG-046 “Praise of Mary”; TKMG-047 “Homily of the Sabbath of Christians”, TKMG-048 “Missail (incomplete at the beginning)”; TKMG-050 “The Covenant of Mary”.
Tabots of Trinity, Kidanä Mǝḥrät, possibly Ṣadǝqan.
